question: ‘Bina Oil Refinery’ has been started in colloboration of which two oil companies?
option1: Indian oil corporation and Royal Dutch Shell
option2: Bharat petroleum and Oman oil company
option3: Hindustan petroleum and Oman oil company
option4: Bharat petroleum and Dubai Oil company
answer: Bharat petroleum and Oman oil company
explanation: Bharat Oman Refineries Limited (BORL) is a company that owns and operates Bina Refinery.It is joint venture between India’s Bharat Petroleum Corporation (BPCL) and Oman’s Oman Oil Company
